citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility lacks a written environmental enhancement plan for its primates. Primates may become psychologically
distressed when not provided adequate enrichment. Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan
for environment enhancement, as directed by the attending veterinarian. The plan must address social grouping,
environmental enrichment, special considerations, such as infants and juveniles, individually housed primates, and any
primates showing signs of psychological distress. Correct by 1/2/26.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
3.81 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility lacks a written environmental enhancement plan for its primates. Primates may become psychologically 
distressed when not provided adequate enrichment. Exhibitors must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan 
for environment enhancement, as directed by the attending veterinarian. The plan must address social grouping, 
environmental enrichment, special considerations, such as infants and juveniles, individually housed primates, and any 
primates showing signs of psychological distress. Correct by 1/2/26. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
End Section
